title: World Building - Magic System Limitations (catalyst scarcity)
content: Catalyst requires: 1) Starlight captured in obsidian lenses, 2) Blood of a 'true alchemist' (genetic marker), 3) Volcanic ash from dormant volcanoes. Only 0.001% of catalyst works transmutation â€“ rest turns volatile. Limitations create tension: Elara must choose between preserving catalyst for research or using it for immediate power.
